alert.note: Alert for Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 8:27PM CDT until June 14 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Stone County in north central Arkansas... Izard County in north central Arkansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brandenberg, or 8 miles southwest of Melbourne, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Melbourne... Horseshoe Bend... Oxford... Mount Pleasant... Franklin... Brandenberg... Lone Star... Gid... Herpel... Stella... Lunenburg... Myron... Lacrosse... Guion... Allison... Mt Olive in Izard County... Zion... Violet Hill... Larkin... Boswell... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
